name: One Level 2: Stickman Jailbreak
description:
You will not break out any more!

Hardly had Tommy broken out of prison when he hit the bricks again! The escape seems to be impossible: upgraded security system, increased concentration of prickles, attentive chief warders and crazy watch bumble-bees don`t give a chance to break out. Tommy will have to struggle his freedom!

Every time the escape conditions change. The tasks became more difficult and the pressure is harder. Use your brains and friends all the way!

Our hero is waiting for you! Help him! 

The game is translated into 7 languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese, Russian;

New:
- now 180 unique levels are available
- 3 secret levels  
- animated interface objects
- extra objects to interact
- crazy watch bumble-bees

Stayed the same:
-“friend`s back up” option
- promptings
- description

You can solve the puzzles alone or with your friends and spend time well!
